meanings.definition: In a manner that is difficult or impossible to believe.
meanings.sent1: She ran unbelievably fast in the race.
meanings.sent2: The magician performed unbelievably well at the show.
meanings.sent3: The cat danced unbelievably on its hind legs.
meanings.sent4: His story was so unbelievable, it was like a fairy tale.
meanings.sent5: The mountain was unbelievably tall, reaching the clouds.

meanings.definition: To an extreme degree or extent.
meanings.sent1: He unbelievably completed the puzzle in record time.
meanings.sent2: The team unbelievably won the championship.
meanings.sent3: The cake grew unbelievably in the oven.
meanings.sent4: Her smile lit up the room unbelievably.
meanings.sent5: The flowers bloomed unbelievably after the rain.
